# Portfolio With Webpack (Platzi Course)

Practical course of application deployment with Webpack using the Portfolio made with **Vanilla Javascript** as a base project

> At its core, webpack is a static module bundler for modern JavaScript applications. When webpack processes your application, it internally builds a dependency graph from one or more entry points and then combines every module your project needs into one or more bundles, which are static assets to serve your content from. [Webpack Page]('https://webpack.js.org/concepts/')
